exceptions.exn: The LHS of IHn (INR (pow2 n)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment n : nat IHn : INR (pow2 n) = 2 ^ n Unable to unify "2 ^ n * 2" with "INR ((fix pow2 (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0%nat => 1%nat | S n0 => (pow2 n0 + (pow2 n0 + 0))%nat end) n + ((fix pow2 (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0%nat => 1%nat | S n0 => (pow2 n0 + (pow2 n0 + 0))%nat end) n + 0))".

original: intros. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHn. unfold pow2. simpl. rewrite Rmult_comm. reflexivity.
